description:
Want to know if your friend or loved one is telling the truth? Now you can with this amazing application!

This Lie Detector (Polygraph) machine app will help you know whether your friend is telling you the truth or not! What they don't know is that you can actually manipulate the results depending on "how" you activate the application to look at their reaction and have a blast at it!


Steps:
- Ask a YES/NO question to your friend.
- Tap the left side of the start button to generate a "lie"
- Tap the right side of the start button to generate a "truth"

Normally a polygraph is an instrument that measures and records several physiological indices such as blood pressure, pulse, respiration, breathing rhythms/ratios and skin conductivity while the subject is asked and answers a series of questions in the belief that deceptive answers will produce physiological responses that can be differentiated from those associated with non-deceptive answers; this application cannot take those measures and it should therefore be used for entertainment purposes only!
